feed.title: BIP: Block signal enforcement via tx fees

entry.title: BIP: Block signal enforcement via tx fees
entry.summary: In this email exchange, ZmnSCPxj points out a minor editorial error where a paragraph has been repeated and suggests that one of them should be referring to the Testnet instead of the Bitcoin mainnet. The mentioned paragraph provides information about the BIP8 activation for Bitcoin mainnet and states that both the starttime and timeout will be determined at a later time and communicated through Epoch timestamp.
